title: Newcastle Coders: Startup Founders share their tech stacks
presenterName: Kelvin Htat, Cameron Moore, Steven Hodgson, & Josh Leask
abstract:
Startup tech stacks!

Four technical cofounders will share a rapid-fire overview of the tech they are using to build and run their businesses. Come hear how they have designed their architecture, what they love, and what they regret.

Featuring:
- Kelvin Htat, Licode (App builder)
- Cameron Moore, Lyngo (Phone assistant for allied health clinics)
- Steven Hodgson, NoVamps (Web app hosting)
- Josh Leask, Seestone (Buying optimisation for fashion retailers)

We'll have free pizza and drinks thanks to our sponsors:
SSW
Saphi Engineering

Come along to see how great products are being created here in Newcastle.
